summary: A confidential memo from a Clinical Nurse Specialist at the Bureau of Prisons, Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, regarding Jeffrey Epstein. The document appears to be an internal communication concerning Epstein's status or condition, sent shortly before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the confidential memo from the Bureau of Prisons Clinical Nurse Specialist.

events.title: Clinical Memo Regarding Epstein
events.description: A confidential memo is sent by a Clinical Nurse Specialist at the Bureau of Prisons' MCC New York concerning Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A confidential memo regarding Jeffrey Epstein was sent on August 10, 2019, from a Clinical Nurse Specialist at the Bureau of Prisons.
The memo originated from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, where Epstein was held.
The document is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL' and is part of the Southern District of New York (SDNY) case files.
The memo was sent just one day before Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 11, 2019.
